scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter './frontend' dev" "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT
